Taken from here: https://create.stephan-brumme.com/hash-library/
At that site, the git entry is also given. 
Therefore, run

git clone https://github.com/stbrumme/hash-library
cd hash-library
git checkout d389d18112bcf7e4786ec5e8723f3658a7f433d7

Checkout Commit Tag: d389d18112bcf7e4786ec5e8723f3658a7f433d7
